data.eml:eml: New species of Glenophisis (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Hexacentrinae) from Singapore, with key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Ming Kai (2012): New species of Glenophisis (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Hexacentrinae) from Singapore, with key to species. Zootaxa 3185: 64-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279998
